a.title: Hendrick Hudson School District

span.p:
This page provides families with information aimed at providing support and guidance for during this time of school closures.
We deeply appreciate the high level of professionalism of our faculty and staff and know that we will continue to strive to deliver quality education in this temporary and difficult environment. We are facing an incredibly challenging situation, and we are asking a lot of teachers, parents and students.
We appreciate your patience and understanding as a necessary part of the process.
